channel.title: CVE Feed for Fuji Electric -- Tellus Lite V-Simulator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fuji Electric -- Tellus Lite V-Simulator

item.title: CVE-2023-35127|2024-08-29T19:16:01.866Z -- fuji%20electric -- tellus%20lite%20v-simulator
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow may occur when Fuji Electric Tellus Lite V-Simulator parses a specially-crafted input file.

item.title: CVE-2023-40152|2024-08-29T19:51:44.689Z -- fuji%20electric -- tellus%20lite%20v-simulator
item.description: When Fuji Electric Tellus Lite V-Simulator parses a specially-crafted input file an out of bounds write may occur.

item.title: CVE-2024-37029|2024-07-19T18:51:36.731Z -- fuji%20electric -- tellus%20lite%20v-simulator
item.description: Fuji Electric Tellus Lite V-Simulator is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-37022|2024-07-19T18:51:44.189Z -- fuji%20electric -- tellus%20lite%20v-simulator
item.description: Fuji Electric Tellus Lite V-Simulator is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds write, which could allow an attacker to manipulate memory, resulting in execution of arbitrary code.

item.description: Fuji Electric Tellus Lite V-Simulator is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds write, which could allow an attacker to manipulate memory, resulting in execution of arbitrary code.
